casebody.data:
No. 11-207. Brigid Bailey, Individually and as the Personal Administrator for the Estate of Joseph Paul Bailey, Deceased, and as Guardian ad Litem for Samuel P. Bailey, Paul F. Bailey, and Meghan Bailey, Petitioner v. United States. 565 U.S. 1079, 132 S. Ct. 814,

181 L. Ed. 2d 525,

2011 U.S. LEXIS 8678. December 5, 2011.

Petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Ninth Circuit denied.

Same case below, 623 F.3d 855.
